website_summaries.verdict: This lower priced 12-inch doll is a good value. The set includes her tiara, earrings and shoes.
pros: Elena of Avalor does not have her own movie, but she is a popular choice thanks to her Disney Chanel show
A princess who is already ruling the kingdom
Comes with a scepter and hair clip
A pretty doll at a budget price
cons: The white part of the dress on this Elena doll does not fully connect to the skirt

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but Item defective
customer_reviews.text: My young daughter called the doll gorgeous. The feet on the doll were not casted in the mold well as the feet were cracked. I am worried the toes will break off. I did not want to send back as this was my daughter’s favorite Christmas present and she would not want to part with it.
customer_reviews.author: granola girl

customer_reviews.title: She is beautifully made and perfect for a child or adult who collects dolls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my great-grand daughter's 5th birthday. I know she'll want to play with her, so I plan to buy a second one for her to leave in the case and add to her collection when she's old enough to start her own collection. She is absolutely stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the good quality. Only thing it was a challenge to get the doll out of the box. I had to hide the doll from from grand daughter because I'm using the doll to make her an Elena of Avalor doll cake. I would highly recommend,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Threw her away and gave the dress to my nice Elena doll
customer_reviews.text: The doll has an ugly body and awkward joints. Threw her away and gave the dress to my nice Elena doll, but it wouldn't fit until I took out the side seams because it was not made for a doll with breasts. However, my Elena doll rocked the look and gave a speech on freedom and indepence for the women of Avalor. I just hope this doll doesn't come back, naked and angry. (shudder)
customer_reviews.author: thegoodvampiress

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box but the product is still ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice product n compatible price. The only thing to disappoint is the box is damaged/broken. This is a xmas gift for my daughter. 🙃😒
customer_reviews.author: Lexis

customer_reviews.title: The doll is  so cute . Well-made and durable
customer_reviews.text: Really cute dollars I bought four different ones same company my granddaughter the price is awesome very good quality dolls

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves this doll
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, well made, pretty doll. Watch out for smaller pieces (her shoes, bracelet) if you have kids under 3 in the house. Would make a beautiful gift - my 3 year old loves this doll.

customer_reviews.title: Princess Ellena of Avalor by Disney
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one also for my granddaughter as the prices were great. Didn't have to leave the house for the hustle & bustle at the stores.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter's new favorite toy!

customer_reviews.title: A doll that will make Six year old Girls (and boys maybe) Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my girlfriends little sister for Christmas. As I am a man and probably never touched a barbie doll in my life, I enlisted the help of my GF's six year old little sister for this review. her words are as followed: "This Elena has a very pretty dress, and you can do her hair, and she has pretty shoes like my mom" are you happy with it? "I love it! I want to grow up and be Elena one day so I can be a princess" fair enough. From the looks of it, it is a good doll that will make your young one happy, and that's all I ask for in a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Doll
customer_reviews.text: Even though we have not seen the movie yet my daughter wanted this for her birthday. It is a beautiful doll and is exactly what you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: Princess Elena
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll during ba flash sale and was very happy with her. She is as pretty as the picture and made for a wonderful Christmas present. Being that she was a gift I didn't take her out of her box but I seemed nicely made and her red dress was super cute. I would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: She seems well made and is definitely the quality that we have come to know and love. This doll is perfect for my girls

customer_reviews.title: It was a licensed doll of a Disney princess, ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a licensed doll of a Disney princess, so it's exactly what you'd expect it to be. I wanted a decent-quality toy of Elena to give to a child, I got a decent-quality doll of Elena to give to a child.
customer_reviews.author: Gregorus S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is 6 and I still don't feel comfortable her using it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is crazy. It has such power that I'm scared to fly it in my house but according to the instructions I able only allowed to fly it indoors. Also to lower it or shut it down when you press the button on the base it drops to the ground so quickly and hard that it is bound to break soon. Not really a kid friendly product. My daughter is 6 and I still don't feel comfortable her using it. A useless Christmas present for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi R.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it my daughter was so happy to open this up on Christmas morning

product_meta.title: Disney Elena of Avalor Royal Gown Doll-Poseable Disney Princess Figurine Dressed for the Royal Ball
product_meta.description:
Meet Elena of Avalor, the adventurous Crown Princess who wields her scepter with bravery and compassion. 

Crown Princess Elena of Avalor weaves a magical tale of adventure as she embarks on a heroic journey to become a wise and noble queen. She is a strong leader whose independent and curious spirit shines in each adventure she goes on. 

No one said being in charge would be easy, but this princess-in-charge will do her best to rule. This is her time to discover the power within! 

The royal ball has arrived, and Elena of Avalor needs to look her royal best! This beautiful fashion doll, inspired by the character on the Disney Channel TV series, comes wearing a ball gown adorned with a detailed glitter print. The doll also comes with a tiara, bracelet, and removable shoes. 

This line of fashion dolls, inspired by the Elena of Avalor Disney Channel TV series, offers many ways to play and opens a world of magical adventures for girls to imagine. 

Makes a great gift for your little girl in mind. By playing with this Disney Princess doll, children can act out their favorite scenes from their favorite show and movie. Collect all the Disney Princess Fashion Dolls (each sold separately) for epic, fashionable fun.
feature_bullets: DISNEY’S ELENA OF AVALOR DOLL – meet Elena of Avalor, the bold, compassionate, funny, and clever Crown Princess of Avalor. The royal ball has arrived, and Elena of Avalor needs to look her very best! Kids can help dress this Elena doll in her glitter print ball gown

FASHION DOLLS WITH ACCESSORIES – add this Disney princess toys to their growing collection of Disney princess dolls. Includes removable fashion doll accessories, outfit, tiara, bracelet, pair of shoes and pair of earrings fit for a princess

COLLECT AND CONNECT – bring together all the Disney Princesses (each sold separately) for epic fashionable fun as you recreate your favorite scenes from the Disney Channel TV series and the magical adventures your child can get into

POSEABLE FIGURES – Elena of Avalor is always ready to rule in her majestic kingdom! Girls can play out their most loved and enchanting scenes with articulation that allows for fun and beautiful poses. Kids can help dress this Elena doll in her glitter print ball gown. Recommended for ages 3 and up

AN IDEAL HOLIDAY GIFT – adorable gift to give to children and grandchildren so they can develop their fine motor skills, imagination, and increase curiosity. This set is the perfect gift for birthdays, Christmas and other holidays

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars354 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
